original:
[OnSucceedAttack] バリアが全て消耗されなかったら、[Grudge]を攻撃加重値で割った数値をそれぞれ固定ダメージとして付与
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] バリアが全て消耗されなかったら、[Grudge]を攻撃加重値で割った数値をそれぞれ固定ダメージとして付与
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 보호막이 전부 소모되지 않았다면, 공격 가중치만큼 [Grudge] 수치를 나눠 고정 피해로 부여함.
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] If the Shield isn't fully depleted, divide [Grudge] value by Atk Weight and inflict it as fixed damage.

KR:

EN:

original:
[CantChangeTarget]
体力が最も低い対象を優先して攻撃
[EnemyKill] [Grudge]が2倍になる
[EnemyKill] [Grudge]だけ体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[CantChangeTarget]
体力が最も低い対象を優先して攻撃
[EnemyKill] [Grudge]が2倍になる
[EnemyKill] [Grudge]だけ体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[CantChangeTarget]
체력이 가장 없는 대상 우선 공격
[EnemyKill] [Grudge]가 2배가 됨.
[EnemyKill] [Grudge]만큼 체력 회복
EN:
[CantChangeTarget]
Prioritizes the unit with the least HP
[EnemyKill] Double the [Grudge] value.
[EnemyKill] Heal HP equal to [Grudge] value

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Grudge] 수치만큼 고정 피해.
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Deal fixed damage equal to [Grudge] value.
